system.effect: The attack slams into the target's head, fracturing his skull and opening a long tear in his scalp. The target is Stunned for [[1d10]] rounds. His Movement is halved (rounding up) for [[1d10]] hours.

description.value:
Impact Damage to Head (Severity 7)

The attack slams into the target's head, fracturing his skull and opening a long tear in his scalp. The target is Stunned for [[1d10]] rounds. His Movement is halved (rounding up) for [[1d10]] hours.
